idea-plugin.name: FindActivity
idea-plugin.description:
An AndroidStudio plugin that can quickly get the activity and fragment displayed in the current app and jump when adb is active.
Usage：choose Menu -> Tools -> FindActivity to use or just use keyboard shortcut "Alt + 0"

此插件可以通过快速获取到当前APP显示的Activity和其中的Fragment并进行跳转
使用方式：点击菜单栏 -> 工具 -> FindActivity 或者通过快捷键 "Alt + 0"
